p: A comparative analysis of the efficacy of THCs performed using the Wilcoxon signed-rank test revealed a highly significant reduction in the gingival index score for appearance ( p=0.008), bleeding ( p=0.002), gingival inflammation ( p < 0.001), and the total point of all parameters ( p < 0.001) (Supplementary Table 3). Overall, after the treatment, a substantial reduction in gingivitis plaque was observed in all 29 patients.
